I love the learning process and I've thus make it habitual. As the famous adage goes knowlodge is power, thus making learning a super power.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch for a meaningful collaboration/contribution on your project/site developments: together we can make magic!

education.school: University of Toronto St George, CA
education.degree: Honours Bachelor's Degree, Geophysics/Physics Math minor

work.title: Data Analyst/Lab Technician
work.description: The Jack-Satterly Geochronology Laboratory is at the forefront in the field of precise uranium-lead (U-Pb) dating. It is the birthplace of modern ID-TIMS (isotope dilution-thermal ionization mass spectrometry) methods. We specialize in obtaining ages (TIMS & ICP) with the highest accuracy and precision.

testimonials.text: Elijah is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge in Frontend Development and single page app is awesomely amazing... I would definitely recommend
Elijah is an accomplished self-taught Frontend React developer with transferable skills set, an avid learner who continually demonstrates strong ability to solve technical problems diligently
